p.k: Richard discovers that going into a bank whilst wearing a motorcycle helmet can land you in a lot of trouble. / When Gumball finds out that their 8-bit friend Ocho has an Italian plumber called Mario for an uncle, he assumes it’s ‘that’ Mario and says he’ll do anything to meet him. / The prize jewel on the Secret Joyful Burger menu is a mysterious burger, but to order it you need to know its name. And Larry refuses to tell the guys what it's called... / When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie, Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. / Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that Rob has moved on.
